original_text: And to Seth, to him also there was born a son; and he called his name Enos: then began men to call upon the name of the Lord.
korean_text: 셋도 아들을 낳고 그의 이름을 에노스라 하였으며 그 때에 사람들이 비로소 여호와의 이름을 불렀더라

sentences.original_text: to him also there was born a son;
and he called his name Enos:
then began men to call upon the name of the Lord.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 사람들이 주의 이름을 부르기 시작했습니다.
